snippet: Studying film of the Cleveland Brown’s defense with quarterback Eli Manning helped the rookie Rueben Randle gain confidence as Manning’s go-to receiver in the Giants’ win.
abstract: New York Giants rookie wide receiver Rueben Randle says studying film of the Cleveland Brown’s defense with quarterback Eli Manning helped him gain confidence and push him to the next level.
lead_paragraph: Studying film of the Cleveland Brown’s defense with quarterback Eli Manning helped the rookie Rueben Randle gain confidence as Manning’s go-to receiver in the Giants’ win.

headline.seo: After Studying Film With Eli Manning, Giants’ Rueben Randle Plays His Best Game
